code: function formatTime(data){if(typeof data!="string")return;var date=new Date(Date.parse(data));var hour=new Intl.DateTimeFormat('ru',{hour:'numeric'}).format(date);var minute=new Intl.DateTimeFormat('en',{minute:'2-digit'}).format(date);return"".concat(hour.padStart(2,'0'),":").concat(minute.padStart(2,'0'));}export default formatTime;
